Posts.Title: Depressed even after good news Bonniejo67 stagefree

Posts.Content: Bonniejo67 wrote: Hi, I had CT's today and dr appt, Zometa infusion and my Faslodex injections.  My CTs looked good and everything looks promising, no new growth is showing up so why do I feel down and depressed rather than elated?  What's wrong with me?   Bonnie Dx 12/1999, Stage IV, Grade 2, ER+/PR+, HER2- Surgery 12/21/1999 Lumpectomy: Left; Lymph node removal: Left, Underarm/Axillary Hormonal Therapy 12/31/1999 Chemotherapy 3/31/2000 AC Radiation Therapy 4/14/2000 Breast, Lymph nodes Radiation Therapy 4/13/2007 Bone Hormonal Therapy 4/30/2007 Arimidex (anastrozole) Surgery 5/4/2007 Prophylactic ovary removal Chemotherapy 5/9/2007 Carboplatin (Paraplatin), Taxotere (docetaxel) Hormonal Therapy 11/30/2011 Aromasin (exemestane) Radiation Therapy 12/2/2011 Bone Hormonal Therapy 9/24/2012 Faslodex (fulvestrant) Radiation Therapy 9/25/2012 Bone Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Depressed even after good news Bonniejo67 stagefree

Posts.Content: Bonniejo67 wrote: Hi,  I'm new to this board.  Wondering if anyone else has had similar experiences.  I was treated in December 2011 with Cyber Knife to an area of in the deep soft tissue near my T11 vertebrae.  Symptoms went away quickly but returned and the cancer has returned to that area.  Just finished 12 rounds of radiation to the same area.  What are your experiences with cancer returning to an area that was treated with Cyber Knife?  My symptoms (due to pressure on a nerve) haven't gone away.  Does cancer get resistant to radiation?  Would welcome others thoughts and experiences.  Thank you! Bonnie Dx 12/1999, Stage IV, Grade 2, ER+/PR+, HER2- Surgery 12/21/1999 Lumpectomy: Left; Lymph node removal: Left, Underarm/Axillary Hormonal Therapy 12/31/1999 Chemotherapy 3/31/2000 AC Radiation Therapy 4/14/2000 Breast, Lymph nodes Radiation Therapy 4/13/2007 Bone Hormonal Therapy 4/30/2007 Arimidex (anastrozole) Surgery 5/4/2007 Prophylactic ovary removal Chemotherapy 5/9/2007 Carboplatin (Paraplatin), Taxotere (docetaxel) Hormonal Therapy 11/30/2011 Aromasin (exemestane) Radiation Therapy 12/2/2011 Bone Hormonal Therapy 9/24/2012 Faslodex (fulvestrant) Radiation Therapy 9/25/2012 Bone Log in to post a reply
